Actual requirements: Xbox & PS
Automatically obtained when all other trophies have been obtained

In-game description: Attack a tree until a block of wood pops out
Actual requirements: Pick up wood from the ground.
Kill a hostile mob or one of the following neutral mobs: enderman, zombie pigman, spider, cave spider.
This does not have to be in a single game, so multiple games or reloading old saves does count toward this achievement.
Breed two cows or two mooshrooms.
Pick up a potion from a brewing stand potion slot. An already-created potion placed and removed qualifies.
Pick up an enchanted golden apple from a crafting table output.

In-game description: Build a portal to the Nether
Actual requirements: Enter a nether portal.

In-game description: Build some bookshelves to improve your enchantment table
Actual requirements: Pick up a bookshelf from a crafting table output.
Pick up a cooked fish from a furnace output.
Pick up a pickaxe from a crafting table output that is not a wooden pickaxe.

In-game description: Construct a furnace out of eight stone blocks
Actual requirements: Pick up a furnace from a crafting table output. The description has the wrong recipe; furnaces are actually crafted from cobblestone.

In-game description: Construct one type of each tool (one pickaxe, one shovel, one axe and one hoe).
Cook and eat a pork chop.
Craft a workbench with four blocks of planks
Actual requirements: Pick up a crafting table from your inventory's crafting field output or a crafting table output.

In-game description: Craft and place a Flower Pot.

Actual requirements: Be within a 20_20_14 cuboid centered on the pyramid when the beacon block realizes it is fully powered.
Throw a splash potion of weakness at a zombie villager and give it a golden apple (by facing the zombie and pressing the left trigger with a golden apple in your hand)

In-game description: Deal nine hearts of damage in a single hit
Actual requirements: Damage can be dealt to any mob, even those that do not have nine hearts of health overall.
Enter the end exit portal while in the End.

In-game description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball
Actual requirements: Kill a ghast using a ghast fireball.
Visit these 36 biomes. Other biomes may also be visited, but are ignored for the achievement. Biomes are counted as visited even before The End? is achieved.[2]

In-game description: Fly a pig off a cliff
Actual requirements: Be riding a pig (e.g. using a saddle) when it hits the ground with a fall distance greater than 5.
Pick up leather from the ground.
Actual requirements (if different)

In-game description: Kill a skeleton with an arrow from more than 50 meters
Actual requirements: Use a launched arrow to kill a skeleton or wither skeleton from 50 or more blocks away, horizontally.
Be within a 100.9_100.9_203.5 cuboid centered on the Wither when it drops the nether star.
Enter an end portal.

In-game description: Mine 1,728 Cobblestone and place it in a chest
Actual requirements: A player must mine 1,728 cobblestone and place 1,728 cobblestone, or 27 stacks, in a chest. The cobblestone placed in the chest does not have to be the same cobblestone that was mined.
You can do this in different worlds.

In-game description: Play a music disc in a Jukebox.

Actual requirements: Play for 100 Minecraft days, which is equivalent to 33 hours in real time.
Open your inventory. The description will match the configured inventory key.

In-game description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod
Actual requirements: Pick up a blaze rod from the ground.
Pick up an iron ingot from a furnace output.

In-game description: Smelt wood trunks using charcoal to make more charcoal.

Actual requirements: Be within a 100.9_100.9_103.5 cuboid centered on the Wither when it is spawned.
Eat a piece of rotten flesh.

In-game description: Swim in lava while having the Fire Resistance effect.

Actual requirements: Drop a diamond. Another player or a mob must then pick up this diamond.

In-game description: Travel by minecart at least 1 km from where you started
Actual requirements: Travel by minecart to a point at least 1 km from where you started. Distance is measured in a straight line.

Achievement: Travel by minecart to a point at least 500m in a single direction from where you started.
In-game description: Travel by minecart to a point at least 500 m from where you started. Distance is measured in a straight line.

Actual requirements: Pick up bread from a crafting table output.

In-game description: Use a book, obsidian and diamonds to construct an enchantment table
Actual requirements: Pick up an enchantment table from a crafting table output.

In-game description: Use planks and sticks to make a hoe
Actual requirements: Pick up any type of hoe from a crafting table output.

In-game description: Use planks and sticks to make a pickaxe
Actual requirements: Pick up any type of pickaxe from a crafting table output.

In-game description: Use planks and sticks to make a sword
Actual requirements: Pick up any type of sword from a crafting table output.

In-game description: Use Shears to obtain wool from a sheep.
Wear a full suit of Iron Armour.

Actual requirements: Pick up a cake from a crafting table output.

Achievement: Bake cake using wheat, sugar, milk, and eggs!
Actual requirements: Silver
Gold
Silver
